column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I got the Spicy Creamy Vegan Ramen and it was great. Highly recommend even if you're an omnivore! Vegetarian broth isn't usually unique
column2: but this one was awesome. It was spicy and garlicky! The tofu was unlike anything I've had before: it had a jello-like consistency. If you don't think you'd like that
column3: ask for it to be prepared differently! The spinach and sesame seeds were a really good addition the the noodles. If anything
column4: I probably would've added Brussels sprouts in the Ramen because it would've tasted so good!
